Hello! I am an Electrical Power Engineer employed at PixxelSpace. I hold a Bachelor's degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering from BITS Pilani, Pilani Campus. My professional interests predominantly revolve around electronics and the development of PCB boards. I have garnered experience working with prominent corporations such as Texas Instruments, alongside contributing to emerging startups like PixxelSpace.

  • Implemented sensor-ESP32 robust communication using I2C and SPI, ensuring reliable data exchange system responsiveness

Control System

Diode Bridge Rectifier

Electronics

Electrical Power Engineer

Pixxel Space
